Key Match Events: Astros' Jose Altuve left the game against the Yankees after one inning due to a bruised left leg
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dusty Baker said Altuve fouled a ball off his shin in his first at-bat and that he'd hit it on the same spot several times this week
Miscellaneous Highlights: Altuve has been on the injured list twice this season
He missed about three weeks in July with an oblique injury after not making his season debut until May 19 after fracturing his left thumb in the World Baseball Classic
